description: NeatShift - Modern Windows file organization tool with symbolic link support
notes: NeatShift is a Windows file organization tool that moves files and creates symbolic links.
- Move large applications/games without breaking shortcuts and paths
- Smart symbolic link creation for transparent redirection
- Safety features: NeatSaves backup and System Restore points
- Modern Windows 11 style interface with light/dark themes
- Integrated file explorer with symbolic link management
⚠️ Important: NeatShift requires administrator privileges to create symbolic links.
Right-click and 'Run as administrator' or the app will prompt for elevation.
